t: God*pn stands in the congregation of the mighty; He*ld judges among the gods.
How*ld long will you judge unjustly, And*ld show partiality to the wicked? Selah*ipg
Defend*ld the poor and fatherless; Do*ld justice to the afflicted and needy.
Deliver*ld the poor and needy; Free*ld them*i from the hand of the wicked.
They*ln do not know, nor do they understand; They*ld walk about in darkness; All*ld the foundations of the earth are unstable.
I*ln said, “You are*i gods, And*ld all of you are*i children of the Most High.
But*ld you shall die like men, And*ld fall like one of the princes.”
Arise,*ln O God, judge the earth; For*ld You shall inherit all nations.
